faqJsonLd.question: Are speaker notes invisible on Zoom?
faqJsonLd.answer: Yes, CueCard makes your speaker notes completely invisible during Zoom screen sharing. Other participants cannot see your notes while you present.

faqJsonLd.question: How do I use speaker notes in Zoom meetings?
faqJsonLd.answer: Download CueCard, paste or sync your notes from Google Slides, then start your Zoom meeting. Your notes appear only on your screen while remaining invisible to other participants during screen sharing.

faqJsonLd.question: Can I sync Google Slides notes for Zoom presentations?
faqJsonLd.answer: Yes! CueCard syncs speaker notes directly from Google Slides using a browser extension. Your notes automatically appear in CueCard as you navigate through your slides during a Zoom presentation.

faqJsonLd.question: How do I sync Google Slides notes to CueCard?
faqJsonLd.answer: Install the CueCard browser extension for Chrome, Firefox, or Safari. Open your Google Slides presentation and CueCard will automatically sync your speaker notes as you navigate through slides.

faqJsonLd.question: Do notes update automatically when I change slides?
faqJsonLd.answer: Yes! CueCard automatically syncs and displays the speaker notes for your current slide in real-time as you navigate through your Google Slides presentation.

faqJsonLd.question: Which browsers support the Google Slides extension?
faqJsonLd.answer: The CueCard browser extension is available for Chrome, Firefox, and Safari, allowing you to sync notes from Google Slides on any major browser.
